links.title: From L.A. to Rome: Take a look inside some of the coolest new Apple stores around the world
links.description: When you walk into one of Apple's more than 500 retail locations around the world, you can be pretty sure you'll be greeted by the minimalist aesthetic of the tech giant's signature crisp white walls and sleek displays. But that's not all you'll see in some of Apple's new stores in Rome, Istanbul and Los Angeles.

links.title: Hon Hai expects 'unprecedented' Q1 for soaring iPhone sales
links.description: Hon Hai Precision Industry Co., the major assembler of the iPhone, may achieve "unprecedented" performance in the first quarter, Bloomberg reported Sunday, quoting the company's chairman Young Liu.
